alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Richland; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Calhoun, southwestern Sumter and southeastern Richland Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 500 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northeast of St. Matthews, or 14 miles southeast of McEntire Air Base, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... St. Matthews, Poinsett State Park, Pinewood, Fort Motte and Creston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
